activity_center_error_load_failed_messag: We weren't able to load this page. If your Internet connection is otherwise ok, wait a few minutes and try again.
activity_center_component_media_card_pat: Temporarily unavailable while the client is updating. Check back in a few moments.
activity_center_remaining_time_is_far_fr: This activity will last for a long time
activity_center_error_message: An unexpected error occured.  Please check back later
activity_center_error_screen_description: Pages are not loading as intended. Please check back later as Heimerdinger figures out the cause. We're sorry for any inconvenience.
info_hub_client_error_description: The Info Hub is currently not loading as intended. Please check back later as Heimerdinger looks into what went wrong.
splash_button_log_in_description: Unlock a new champion and other rewards when you play each day.
splash_button_level_up_description: Unlock new maps, spells, and other rewards each time you level up.
intro_header_description_without_login: Get new rewards at every level. Check out what you’ll get next.
intro_header_description: New rewards every day and every level. Check out what you’ll get next.
level_rewards_panel_description: Unlock new maps, spells, and other rewards each time you level up.
login_rewards_panel_description: Unlock a new champion and other rewards when you play each day.
new_player_pack_panel_description: Expand your roster with 5 new champions, plus a handful of other loot.
calendar_rewards_header_level_descriptio: There’s a lot more to League than just champions—here’s what else you’ll unlock.
calendar_rewards_footer_level_message: Use Blue Essence to buy new champions in the store.
calendar_rewards_header_login_title: Unlock a new league champion daily
calendar_rewards_header_login_descriptio: League has over 140 champions—ready to unlock some?
calendar_rewards_footer_login_message: Check your Loot tab above to claim rewards.
reward_pack_major_description_level_1_sp: Get a burst of speed or a quick heal in the middle of a fight.
reward_pack_major_description_level_2_st: Pick your favorite champ: Master Yi, Darius, Lux, Ahri, or Miss Fortune.
reward_pack_major_description_level_3_ca: Add craftable loot to your collection, then play League’s premier 5 vs 5 mode.
reward_pack_major_description_level_4_ga: Get a discount on Garen, barrier in battle, and slow down enemies.
reward_pack_major_description_level_5_br: Battle as a team of three to capture altars and siege the enemy nexus.
reward_pack_major_description_level_6_lo: More loot and the ability to head into the all random madness of the Abyss.
reward_pack_major_description_level_7_lo: Fight other players on Twisted Treeline, get loot, and unlock summoner spells.
reward_pack_major_description_level_7_sp: Get the ability to teleport across the map or flash short distances.
reward_pack_major_description_level_8_lo: Personalize your playstyle with runes that boost your stats and give you powers.
reward_pack_major_description_level_9_lo: Got a new champ? Try their abilities in the practice tool.
reward_pack_major_description_level_10_l: Add strategy to your 5 vs 5 game by drafting champions, or play for fun in a rotating game mode.
reward_pack_major_title_sr_blind_aram: Summoner’s Rift PvP + Howling Abyss ARAM
reward_pack_major_description_spells_gho: Welcome to League! Jump straight into battle with these first two spells.
reward_pack_major_description_poro_pal_s: Welcome to League! Meet your poro pals.
reward_pack_major_description_level_2_fi: Choose a new champ! Try their abilities in the practice tool before taking them into battle.
reward_pack_major_description_sr_blind_a: Play League’s premier 5 versus 5 mode on the Rift or head into the all random, all mid lane madness of the Abyss.
reward_pack_major_description_level_4_sp: Played with that heal yet? Take two more new spells into the fight for a quick barrier or to slow the enemy.
reward_pack_major_description_twisted_tr: Battle as a team of three to capture altars and siege the enemy nexus in this fast-paced game mode.
reward_pack_major_description_poro_pal_e: Say hi to your friends and foes with the Good Pals emote.
reward_pack_major_description_level_6_sp: More spells for any champion, including the ability to recover your mana or chase down foes in ARAM.
reward_pack_major_description_level_7_em: Say hi with the Good Pals emote! Plus, get the ability to teleport across the map or flash short distances.
reward_pack_major_description_ward_skin: Switch up your style with an alternate skin for in-game wards.
reward_pack_major_description_level_9_sp: More spells! Take out monsters with smite, burn down foes with ignite, and remove those disabling effects with cleanse.
reward_pack_major_description_level_9_ru: Create a new customized rune page, equip smite to take out monsters, and burn down foes with ignite.
reward_pack_major_description_level_10_s: Once you own 20 champs, add more strategy to Summoner's Rift by drafting before the match and customizing your runes.
reward_pack_major_description_sr_draft_p: Once you own 20 champions you can add more strategy to your 5 versus 5 game by drafting champs before the match begins.
reward_pack_major_description_marksman_c: Take aim and take down the competition with a marksman champion of your choice.
reward_pack_major_description_fighter_ch: Charge into the fray and beat down foes with a fighter champion of your choice.
reward_pack_major_description_mage_champ: Unleash a storm of spells with a mage champion of your choice.
reward_pack_major_description_support_ch: Control the chaos of the battlefield with a support champion of your choice.
reward_pack_major_description_assassin_c: Seek out vulnerable targets and finish them in a flash with an assassin champion of your choice.
reward_pack_major_description_blue_essen: Pick a champion of your choice by spending Blue Essence in the shop.
reward_pack_major_description_waterloo_m: Unlock the Waterloo Miss Fortune skin for a new look with your new supply of orange essence in your loot.
eras_beginner_journey_completed_missions: You have completed your journey! More fun awaits you in game, keep exploring!
eras_beginner_journey_level_rewards_desc: Unlock new maps, spells, and other rewards each time you level up.
eras_daily_play_rewards_subtitle: Unlock a new league champion daily
eras_daily_play_rewards_navigate_to_loot: Check your loot tab to claim rewards
queue_430_description: Destroy the nexus in League's premiere competitive mode.
queue_830_description: Destroy the nexus in League's premiere competitive mode.
queue_460_description: Battle as a team to capture altars, and siege the enemy nexus.
queue_800_description: Battle as a team to capture altars, and siege the enemy nexus.
queue_450_description: Play this quick game mode with 10 random champions.
hub_error_message_fetch_rewards: Oops! There's something wrong on our end. Try again in a few minutes.
passes_hub_subline: Play games, level up, and get rewards throughout your journey.
passes_challenges_subline: Complete the mission chain to get a Masterwork Chest & Key, plus XP and BE along the way.
passes_daily_play_subline: Unlock a new champion and other rewards when you play each day.
passes_fwotd_subline: Earn bonus XP and Blue Essence when you win each day
passes_challenges_tooltip_subline: A solid set to begin your crafting journey. Comes with a Hextech Key and Masterwork Chest.
season_pass_progression_locked_descripti: Next Reward requires Battle Pass upgrade.
season_pass_rollover_state_title: Next pass and missions coming soon
